headline.main: Italian Lawmakers’ Vote on Same-Sex Civil Unions Stalls

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Debate over the bill has polarized Italy, one of a few countries in Western Europe that don’t recognize same-sex unions in any form.
lead_paragraph: Debate over the bill has polarized Italy, one of a few countries in Western Europe that don’t recognize same-sex unions in any form.
